name: Let's talk about videogames!
description:
A little Bitsy project I made for a presentation I'm giving at a high school about getting started with making games. Putting it here primarily to present it. It probably doesn't make much sense by itself. 

I also made a handout to go with the game with links to a range of easy-to-use game dev software to get started. It can be found here: https://tinyurl.com/gamedevcheatsheet
